review: We bought the fire stick for my 7 year olds TV and it is very simple to use. He has enjoyed the amount of TV shows he has access to.
author: donna bates

review: I bought this fire tv stick expecting to only be able to get Netflix and Amazon prime with it.  I have gotten more!  Of course you can't get the HBO and any other channel where one needs a cable TV provider but there are at least 4 others like Netflix and prime that I can get movies and or TV shows.  And I have not checked them all yet.  I am very pleased with this item and I would recommend it.  It was easy to install and set up.
author: Cheri

review: The fire stick is great, I give it a 3 star rating because the main reason I wanted it is for its ability to search between many apps, however after using I realize it does search hulu and a few others, but not netflix. Also, I was disappointed to realize the device is recommended used with a power source. It appeared to only need to be plugged into the tv, but it is recommended to be plugged into a power source as well. Lastly, while netflix, hulu and amazon stream fine, I've noticed the news apps buffer a ridiculous amount. The image is beautiful and buttons are simple. I also like the phone app for voice search, if only the search would include netflix as well.
author: Patterson "Patterson"

review: Excellent!! Wish I would have bought it months ago!! Able to watch movies and TV shows with ease!!
